sentences.en: All I request of you is that you ( should ) be punctual.
He stressed the point that we should be punctual.
sentences.cn: 他强调的一点是我们必须准时.

sentences.en: He was punctual to the minute.
He's always very punctual. I'll see if he's here yet.
sentences.cn: 他总是很准时。我去看看他是否已经来了。

sentences.en: I have to go now because I must be punctual for class.
sentences.cn: 我现在不得不走了,因为我得准时去上课.

sentences.en: She has been reliable and punctual.
She is always punctual, but her friend is always late.
sentences.cn: 她总是很守时, 可是她的朋友总是迟到.

sentences.en: She’s always very punctual for appointments.

sentences.cn: 中国人历来是十分守时的.

sentences.en: The farmer promised to be punctual to his appointment.
sentences.cn: 农民答应按约定好的时刻准时到来.

sentences.en: The punctual arrival of an airplane is contingent on the weather.
sentences.cn: 飞机是否准时到达要看天气而定.

sentences.en: We can guarantee the punctual arrival of the armored cars in foggy weather.
sentences.cn: 雾天我们能保证装甲车准时到达。

sentences.en: We can guarantee the punctual arrival of the armoured cars in foggy weather.
sentences.cn: 雾天我们能保证装甲车准时到达.

sentences.en: We can not guarantee the punctual arrival of trains in foggy weather.
sentences.cn: 雾天我们不能担保火车准时到达.

trans.tran_en: arriving, happening, or being done at exactly the time that has been arranged
